traits.description: Whenever you use Vault, Smoke Screen or backflip with Evasive Fire you gain 60% movement speed for 2 seconds.
traits.name: Tactical Advantage

traits.description: Every 10 seconds, your next bow attack will immobilize your target for 3 seconds.
traits.name: Thrill of the Hunt
traits.simpleDescription: "The first three were dead before they hit the ground. The others weren't so lucky." —Captain Rumford

traits.description: Your maximum Hatred is increased by 25. In addition, gain 20 Hatred and 2 Discipline whenever you are healed by a health globe.
traits.name: Vengeance
traits.simpleDescription: "If it bleeds you can kill it. Kill this one slowly." —Greyscarr, Veteran Demon Hunter

traits.description: As long as there are no enemies within 10 yards, all damage is increased by 20%.
traits.name: Steady Aim
traits.simpleDescription: "Flee if you can, demon. I have a quiver full of friends who fly faster than you." —Tyla Shrikewing

traits.description: Damage against slowed enemies increased by 15%.
traits.name: Cull the Weak
traits.simpleDescription: "I'll show you the same mercy you showed my helpless family." —Tyla Shrikewing

traits.description:
Critical hits have a chance to restore 2 Discipline.

Discipline is used to fuel many of your tactical and defensive skills.
traits.name: Night Stalker
traits.simpleDescription: "How did I learn to hate, to kill, to flay the flesh from the bones of my prey without pity? You taught me." —Tyla Shrikewing's final words to Naragh the Sin Eater

traits.description: As long as you have not taken damage in the last 5 seconds you gain 2% of your maximum Life per second.
traits.name: Brooding

traits.description: Whenever you are at full Hatred, movement speed is increased by 15%.
traits.name: Hot Pursuit
traits.simpleDescription: "Don't make me chase you back to Hell, vermin. I know a quicker way to send you there." —Tyla Shrikewing

traits.description:
Gain a bonus based on the weapon type of your main hand weapon:
Bow: 15% increased damage
Crossbows: 50% critical hit damage
Hand Crossbows: 10% chance to critical hit
traits.name: Archery
traits.simpleDescription: "Feel the weight of the crossbow in your hand. Now... the wind, the distance, the target's speed. Good. Now try it with blood in your eyes and a demon at your throat." —Greyscarr, Veteran Demon Hunter

traits.description: Enemies hit by Fan of Knives, Spike Trap and Caltrops have their damage reduced by 25% for 3 seconds.
traits.name: Numbing Traps
traits.simpleDescription: "Demonic anatomy is strange and diverse. At times they defy sanity, but in other ways they are just as vulnerable as we are." —Meditations on the Enemy

traits.description:
Reduces the Discipline cost of all skills by 20%.

Discipline is used to fuel many of your tactical and defensive skills.
traits.name: Perfectionist
traits.simpleDescription: Once the trap is sprung you must not relent until every last enemy has fallen. To hesitate is to invite disaster.

traits.description: The duration of your Caltrops, Marked for Death, Spike Trap and Sentry is increased by 100%.
traits.name: Custom Engineering
traits.simpleDescription: The self-loading mechanisms built into most hand crossbows and traps are delicate and difficult to maintain. Extensive practice is required to use them properly.

traits.description: Increases Hatred generated from Grenades by 2 and reduces the Hatred cost of Cluster Arrow by 10. Upon death, you drop a giant grenade that explodes for 450% weapon damage as Fire.
traits.name: Grenadier
traits.simpleDescription: "Do not construct these devices by candlelight, nor by firelight. Once armed, be no closer than ten paces upon the count of three." —Explicit instructions from Quang the Chemist

traits.description: Gain a 3% chance to critical hit every second. This bonus is reset 1 second after you successfully critical hit.
traits.name: Sharpshooter
traits.simpleDescription: "Every creature has a vulnerability. Find it, and put an arrow in it." —Greyscarr, Veteran Demon Hunter

traits.description:
Damage from rockets increased by 100%.

Rockets are fired from certain socketed skill effects.
traits.name: Ballistics
traits.simpleDescription: "How should I know who first invented these devices? Just make sure the correct end is pointed at the enemy and they'll do the rest." —Greyscarr, Veteran Demon Hunter

runes.name: Piercing Arrow
runes.description: Increase the chance for the arrow to pierce to 55%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the piercing chance of the arrow.

runes.name: Cinder Arrow
runes.description: Light the arrow on fire, dealing 35% additional weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Light the arrow on fire and burn the target.

runes.name: Shatter Shot
runes.description: If the arrow successfully pierces the first target, the arrow splits into 3 arrows.
runes.simpleDescription: Arrow has a chance to split into multiple arrows.

runes.name: Devouring Arrow
runes.description: Each consecutive pierce increases the damage of the arrow by 70%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage of the arrow with each target pierced.

runes.name: Spray of Teeth
runes.description: Successful critical hits cause a burst of bone to explode from the target, dealing 50% weapon damage to enemies in that area.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits cause the target's bones to explode.

skills.name: Hungering Arrow
skills.description:
Generate: 3 Hatred

Fire a magically imbued arrow that seeks out targets for 115% weapon damage and has a 35% chance to pierce through targets.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 3 Hatred

Fire a piercing arrow that seeks additional targets.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Impact
runes.description: Impale will knock the target back and stun them for 1.5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Knockback and Stun the target.

runes.name: Chemical Burn
runes.description: Your target will also Bleed for 100% weapon damage as Physical over 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Impale causes the target to Bleed after each strike.

runes.name: Grievous Wounds
runes.description: Gain 100% additional damage to critical hits.
runes.simpleDescription: Critical Hits cause additional damage.

runes.name: Overpenetration
runes.description: The knife will pierce through all enemies in a straight line.
runes.simpleDescription: The knife will pierce through all enemies in a straight line.

runes.name: Awareness
runes.description: After the intial throw, release multiple blades centered on you, dealing 75% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: After the initial throw, release multiple blades that strike all enemies near you.

skills.name: Impale
skills.description:
Cost: 25 Hatred

Impale a target for 250% weapon damage.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 25 Hatred

Throw a knife that can impale enemies.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Volatile Explosives
runes.description: Increase the explosion radius to 14 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the explosive radius of Bola Shot.

runes.name: Thunder Ball
runes.description: When the bola explodes, it deals 130% weapon damage as Lightning and has a 35% chance to stun the primary target for 1.5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Electrify the bola and add a chance to Stun targets.

runes.name: Acid Strike
runes.description: Shoot 3 bolas that deal 130% weapon damage as Poison each. The bolas no longer explode for area damage to nearby targets.
runes.simpleDescription: Fire multiple shots that Poison instead of explode.

runes.name: Bitter Pill
runes.description: After the bola explodes, you have a 35% chance to gain 3 Discipline.
runes.simpleDescription: When the bola explodes you have a chance to regain Discipline.

runes.name: Imminent Doom
runes.description: Augments the bola to deal 182% weapon damage as Arcane to the target and 154% weapon damage as Arcane to all other targets within 7 yards, but increases the explosion delay to 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Fire an Arcane bola that deals increased damage, but takes longer to explode.

skills.name: Bola Shot
skills.description:
Generate: 3 Hatred

Shoot out an explosive bola that wraps itself around its target. After 1 second, the bola explodes dealing 130% weapon damage as Fire to the target and an additional 110% weapon damage as Fire to all other targets within 7 yards.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 3 Hatred

Fire a bola that wraps around a target and explodes.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Hooked Spines
runes.description: Increase the slow amount to 80%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the effectiveness of slowing enemies down.

runes.name: Torturous Ground
runes.description: When the trap is sprung, all enemies in the area are immobilized for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Immobilize enemies caught in the trap.

runes.name: Jagged Spikes
runes.description: Enemies in the area also take 45% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Caltrops can damage enemies.

runes.name: Carved Stakes
runes.description: Reduce the cost to 6 Discipline.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the Discipline cost of Caltrops.

runes.name: Bait the Trap
runes.description: Become empowered while standing in the area of effect, gaining an additional 10% chance to critical hit with all attacks.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your Critical Hit chance while standing in the trap.

skills.name: Caltrops
skills.description:
Cost: 8 Discipline

Lay a trap of caltrops on the ground that activates when an enemy approaches. Once sprung, the caltrops slow the movement of enemies within 12 yards by 60%. This trap lasts 6 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 8 Discipline

Place a trap that slows enemies.

runes.name: Withering Fire
runes.description: Reduces the initial Hatred cost to 5, and ignites your arrows, causing them to deal Fire damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Shoot Fire arrows and reduce the Hatred cost of Rapid Fire.

runes.name: Web Shot
runes.description: Slows the movement of affected targets by 80% for 1 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Slow enemies hit by Rapid Fire.

runes.name: Fire Support
runes.description: While channeling Rapid Fire, launch 3 homing rockets every second. Each rocket deals 35% weapon damage as Physical to nearby targets.
runes.simpleDescription: Launch homing rockets while using Rapid Fire.

runes.name: High Velocity
runes.description: Fire Poison arrows that have a 40% chance to pierce through enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Fire Poison arrows that have a chance to pierce through targets.

runes.name: Bombardment
runes.description: Rapidly fire grenades instead of arrows for 276% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within a 4 yard radius.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw grenades instead of shooting arrows.

skills.name: Rapid Fire
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Hatred initially, and an additional 10 Hatred while channeling

Rapidly fire for 228% weapon damage as Physical.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 10 Hatred

Continually fire a stream of arrows. Movement breaks concentration and decreases Hatred.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Shrapnel
runes.description: Shoot exploding bolts that also deal 30% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 6 yards of the primary target.
runes.simpleDescription: Shoot explosive bolts.

runes.name: Parting Gift
runes.description: Whenever a backflip is triggered, leave a poison bomb behind that explodes for 45% weapon damage as Poison in a 12 yard radius after 1.2 seconds. Turns Evasive Fire into Poison damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Poison the target and drop a bomb when you backflip.

runes.name: Covering Fire
runes.description: Shoot a spread of bolts that hit up to 3 targets for 125% weapon damage each.
runes.simpleDescription: Fire multiple bolts that spread.

runes.name: Displace
runes.description: Increase the distance of the backflip to 30 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the distance of your backflip.

runes.name: Surge
runes.description: Reduces the cost of the backflip to 2 Discipline. Turns Evasive Fire into Lightning damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Electrify the bolt and reduce the cost of your backflip.

skills.name: Evasive Fire
skills.description:
Generate: 4 Hatred
Cost: 4 Discipline if you backflip

Shoot for 125% weapon damage. If an enemy is in front of you at close range, you will also backflip away 15 yards.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 4 Hatred
Cost: 4 Discipline if you backflip

Fire at an enemy and perform an evasive backflip if the target is close.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Equilibrium
runes.description: Increased rate of fire while using Strafe by 30%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase your attack speed when using Strafe.

runes.name: Drifting Shadow
runes.description: Movement speed increased to 100% of normal running speed while strafing.
runes.simpleDescription: Movement speed is increased while strafing.

runes.name: Stinging Steel
runes.description: Throw out knives rather than arrows that do an extra 100% damage on successful critical hits.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw out knives that deal additional damage on Critical Hits.

runes.name: Rocket Storm
runes.description: In addition to regular firing, fire off homing rockets for 60% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Fire homing rockets while moving.

runes.name: Demolition
runes.description: Throw out bouncy grenades that explode for 144% weapon damage to targets within 9 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw grenades that randomly target enemies.

skills.name: Strafe
skills.description:
Cost: 15 Hatred

Shoot at random nearby enemies for 120% weapon damage while moving at 65% of normal movement speed.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 15 Hatred

Shoot at nearby enemies while moving.

runes.name: Chain Gang
runes.description: Hit up to 4 targets.
runes.simpleDescription: Hit up to 4 targets.

runes.name: Chain Lightning
runes.description: Strike targets with electrified chains that do an additional 18% weapon damage per second as Lightning for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Strike targets with electrified chains.

runes.name: Heavy Burden
runes.description: Increase the movement slow duration to 4 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the time enemies are Slowed.

runes.name: Justice is Served
runes.description: Increase the Hatred generated to 6 per shot.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the Hatred generated by Entangling Shot.

runes.name: Bounty Hunter
runes.description: Gain 6% of the damage dealt as Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Convert damage dealt by Entangling Shot to Life.

skills.name: Entangling Shot
skills.description:
Generate: 3 Hatred

Imbue an arrow with shadow energy that deals 75% weapon damage and entangles up to 2 enemies, slowing their movement by 60% for 2 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 3 Hatred

Imbue an arrow with shadow energy, slowing up to 2 enemies.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Twin Chakrams
runes.description: A second Chakram mirrors the first. Each Chakram deals 101% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw two Chakrams instead of one.

runes.name: Serpentine
runes.description: The Chakram follows a slow curve, dealing 203% weapon damage as Poison to enemies along the path.
runes.simpleDescription: The Chakram follows a slow curve, hitting enemies in its path.

runes.name: Razor Disk
runes.description: The Chakram spirals out from the targeted location dealing 165% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies along the path.
runes.simpleDescription: The Chakram spirals out from the targeted location.

runes.name: Boomerang
runes.description: The Chakram path turns into a loop, dealing 188% weapon damage as Lightning to enemies along the path.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw an electrified Chakram that returns to you.

runes.name: Shuriken Cloud
runes.description: Surround yourself with spinning Chakrams for 120 seconds, dealing 30% weapon damage per second as Physical to nearby enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Surround yourself with spinning Chakrams.

skills.name: Chakram
skills.description:
Cost: 10 Hatred

Fire a swirling Chakram that does 150% weapon damage as Physical to enemies along its path.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 10 Hatred

Release a spinning blade of death that slices through enemies.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Acrobatics
runes.description: Removes the Discipline cost but adds a 15 cooldown.
runes.simpleDescription: Removes the Discipline cost but adds a cooldown.

runes.name: Rattling Roll
runes.description: All enemies within 8 yards of your destination are knocked back and stunned for 1.5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Knockback and Stun enemies when you land.

runes.name: Action Shot
runes.description: As you travel, shoot arrows for 75% weapon damage at nearby targets.
runes.simpleDescription: Fire at nearby targets while Vaulting.

runes.name: Tumble
runes.description: After using Vault, your next Vault within 6 seconds has its Discipline cost reduced by 50%.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the Discipline cost if you Vault immediately after landing.

runes.name: Trail of Cinders
runes.description: Ignite with fire dealing 100% weapon damage as Fire to everything along your path.
runes.simpleDescription: Leave a trail of fire in your wake.

skills.name: Vault
skills.description:
Cost: 10 Discipline

Tumble acrobatically 35 yards.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 10 Discipline

Tumble acrobatically to avoid attacks.

runes.name: Tinkerer
runes.description: Increases Hatred generation to 6 Hatred.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases Hatred generation to 6 Hatred.

runes.name: Cluster Grenades
runes.description: Throw Cluster Grenades that deal 112% weapon damage as Fire over an 8 yard radius.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw cluster grenades.

runes.name: Fire Bomb
runes.description: Throw a single grenade that deals 123% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw a single grenade that deals heavy damage.

runes.name: Stun Grenades
runes.description: Hurl grenades that have a 15% chance to Stun enemies for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Grenades have a chance to Stun enemies.

runes.name: Gas Grenades
runes.description: Throw gas grenades that explode for 95% weapon damage as Poison and leaves a cloud that deals an additional 25% weapon damage per second as Poison for 3 seconds to enemies who stand in the area.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw gas grenades that explode and leave a cloud of Poison gas.

skills.name: Grenades
skills.description:
Generate: 3 Hatred

Throw out three grenades that explode for 95% weapon damage as Fire each.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 3 Hatred

Throw three grenades that bounce and explode.

runes.name: Contagion
runes.description: When the target is killed, the ability spreads to 2 other nearby targets. This effect can chain repeatedly.
runes.simpleDescription: When the target is killed, additional enemies are Marked for Death.

runes.name: Valley of Death
runes.description: Mark an area on the ground 12 yards wide for 15 seconds. Enemies in the area take 15% additional damage.
runes.simpleDescription: All enemies in the targeted area become Marked for Death.

runes.name: Grim Reaper
runes.description: An additional 15% of damage done to the target is also divided among all enemies within 20 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: A portion of damage done against the target is also applied to nearby enemies.

runes.name: Mortal Enemy
runes.description: Attacks you make against the marked target generate 3 Hatred.
runes.simpleDescription: Attacks against the marked target generate Hatred.

runes.name: Death Toll
runes.description: 1% of damage done to the marked target heals the attacker.
runes.simpleDescription: Damage against the marked target heals the attacker.

skills.name: Marked for Death
skills.description:
Cost: 6 Discipline

Marks an enemy. The marked enemy will take 15% additional damage for the next 30 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 6 Discipline

Marks an enemy to take additional damage from attacks.

runes.name: Crippling Razors
runes.description: Increase the slow amount to 80% for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the duration enemies are slowed.

runes.name: Retaliate
runes.description: Surround yourself with whirling blades that deal 464% weapon damage to all enemies if you are struck in the next 10 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Surround yourself with whirling blades that strike any enemies that attack you.

runes.name: Hail of Knives
runes.description: Increase the radius to damage all enemies within 20 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the radius and damage of Fan of Knives.

runes.name: Fan of Daggers
runes.description: Imbue your knives with a 80% chance to stun enemies for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Imbue your knives with a chance to Stun enemies.

runes.name: Assassin's Knives
runes.description: Throw long-range knives that deal 70% weapon damage to 5 additional targets.
runes.simpleDescription: Throw long-range knives that randomly target enemies.

skills.name: Fan of Knives
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Hatred
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Throw knives out in a spiral around you, doing 320% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards of you. Your knives will also slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Hatred

Unleash a flurry of knives that strike and Slow all nearby enemies.

runes.name: Bandolier
runes.description: Increase the maximum number of traps that can be out simultaneously to 6.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the maximum number of traps you can place.

runes.name: Sticky Trap
runes.description: Plant a bomb on an enemy rather than on the ground. If the target dies within 30 seconds, the trap explodes dealing 196% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Plant a bomb on an enemy that explodes when the target dies.

runes.name: Long Fuse
runes.description: Increases the arming time to 2.0 seconds but increases damage to 182% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: A more powerful trap with a longer fuse.

runes.name: Lightning Rod
runes.description: When the trap is triggered it releases a pulse of lightning that will bounce to up to 3 enemies for 135% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Place electrified traps that have a chance to electrocute multiple enemies.

runes.name: Scatter
runes.description: Simultaneously place all 3 traps at once.
runes.simpleDescription: Simultaneously place multiple traps and increase their damage.

skills.name: Spike Trap
skills.description:
Generate: 4 Hatred

Lay a trap that arms after 1.2 seconds and triggers when an enemy approaches. The trap does 135% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards.

You can have a maximum of 3 Spike Traps active at one time.
skills.simpleDescription:
Generate: 4 Hatred

A deadly trap that explodes on contact once armed.

runes.name: Invigoration
runes.description: When activated, increases your maximum Discipline by 10 for 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases your maximum Discipline after using Prepartion.

runes.name: Punishment
runes.description: Removes cooldown. Skill now costs 20 Discipline to cast and restores all Hatred.
runes.simpleDescription: Preparation now costs Discipline to cast but restores all Hatred instead of Discipline and removes the cooldown.

runes.name: Battle Scars
runes.description: Regain 60% Life when using Preparation.
runes.simpleDescription: Regain Life when using Preparation.

runes.name: Focused Mind
runes.description: Gain 45 Discipline over 15 seconds instead of replenishing Discipline immediately.
runes.simpleDescription: Continually gain Discipline over time instead of replenishing Discipline immediately.

runes.name: Backup Plan
runes.description: Grants a 30% chance that the cooldown will not be triggered when used.
runes.simpleDescription: Grants a chance that the cooldown will not be triggered when using Preparation.

skills.name: Preparation
skills.description:
Cooldown: 45 seconds

Instantly restore all Discipline.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 45 seconds

Focus and instantly restore all Discipline.

runes.name: Ball Lightning
runes.description: Fire a slow moving arrow that electrocutes enemies along its path for 155% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Fire a slow moving arrow that electrocutes enemies along its path.

runes.name: Frost Arrow
runes.description: Fire a Frost arrow that splits into multiple arrows after hitting its target, dealing 170% weapon damage as Cold. Affected enemies have their movement speed slowed by 60% for 1 second.
runes.simpleDescription: Fire a Frost arrow that splits into multiple arrows after hitting its target.

runes.name: Screaming Skul
runes.description: Grants a 40% chance to shoot a skull that will fear affected enemies for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Grant a chance to shoot a skull that causes Fear.

runes.name: Lightning Bolts
runes.description: Fire electrified bolts that stun enemies for 2 seconds when they critically hit.
runes.simpleDescription: Fire electrified bolts that Stun enemies.

runes.name: Nether Tentacles
runes.description: Unleash shadow tentacles that deal 155% weapon damage and return 3% of damage dealt as Life for you.
runes.simpleDescription: Unleash shadow tentacles that convert damage dealt to Life.

skills.name: Elemental Arrow
skills.description:
Cost: 10 Hatred

Shoot an elemental charged arrow that deals 155% weapon damage as Fire to all targets it passes through.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 10 Hatred

Unleash a fiery arrow that pierces through enemies.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Spitfire Turret
runes.description: The turret will also fire homing rockets every 1.5 seconds aimed at random nearby targets for 40% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Sentry turret can fire homing rockets at random targets.

runes.name: Vigilant Watcher
runes.description: Increases duration of the turret to 30 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration of Sentry.

runes.name: Chain of Torment
runes.description: Create a tether between you and the Sentry that does 40% weapon damage every second to every enemy it touches.
runes.simpleDescription: Create a tether between you and the Sentry that damages enemies that touch it.

runes.name: Aid Station
runes.description: Heals nearby allies for 1.0% of their maximum Life per second.
runes.simpleDescription: Sentry turret heals nearby allies.

runes.name: Guardian Turret
runes.description: The turret also creates a shield that reduces damage taken by allies by 20%.
runes.simpleDescription: The Sentry turret creates a shield that reduces damage taken by allies.

skills.name: Sentry
skills.description:
Cost: 10 Discipline

Drop a turret on the ground. The turret begins firing at nearby enemies for 20% weapon damage. Lasts 20 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 10 Discipline

Summon a turret that automatically attacks nearby enemies.

runes.name: Fire at Will
runes.description: Cost reduced to 10 Hatred. Deals 115% weapon damage as Lightning.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the Hatred cost and convert damage to Lightning.

runes.name: Burst Fire
runes.description: Every time you fire, generate a shock pulse that damages nearby enemies for 45% weapon damage as Arcane.
runes.simpleDescription: Every time you fire, generate an Arcane shock pulse that damages nearby enemies.

runes.name: Supression Fire
runes.description: Every enemy hit grants 1 Discipline.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Discipline for each enemy hit.

runes.name: Full Broadside
runes.description: Increase the damage of Multishot to 150% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage of Multishot.

runes.name: Arsenal
runes.description: Every use also fires 3 rockets at nearby enemies that deal 40% weapon damage as Fire each.
runes.simpleDescription: Fire multiple homing rockets.

skills.name: Multishot
skills.description:
Cost: 15 Hatred

Fire a massive volley of arrows dealing 115% weapon damage to all enemies in the area.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 15 Hatred

Fire a massive volley of arrows in an arc.

runes.name: Displacement
runes.description: Gain 35% movement speed when activated.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain a movement speed bonus when using Smoke Screen.

runes.name: Lingering Fog
runes.description: Increase the duration of the effect to 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the duration of Smoke Screen.

runes.name: Breathe Deep
runes.description: While invisible you gain 20 Hatred per second.
runes.simpleDescription: While invisible, you gain additional Hatred.

runes.name: Special Recipe
runes.description: Reduce the cost to 12 Discipline.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the Discipline cost of Smoke Screen.

runes.name: Choking Gas
runes.description: Leave behind a cloud of gas that deals 70% weapon damage per second as Physical to enemies in the area for 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Leave behind a cloud of deadly gas.

skills.name: Smoke Screen
skills.description:
Cost: 15 Discipline

Vanish behind a wall of smoke, becoming momentarily invisible for 2 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 15 Discipline

Vanish from sight for a limited time.

runes.name: Spider Companion
runes.description: Summons a spider instead of a raven. The spider's attacks also slow the movement of targets by 60% for 2 - 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a spider that attacks and Slows enemies.

runes.name: Bat Companion
runes.description: Summons a bat instead of a raven. The bat grants you 3 Hatred per second.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a bat that increases your Hatred regeneration.

runes.name: Boar Companion
runes.description: Summon a boar instead of a raven. The boar's attacks hit all enemies in an area with every swing.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a boar that can strike multiple enemies.

runes.name: Ferret Companion
runes.description: Summons ferrets instead of a raven. The ferrets collect gold for you and increase gold found on monsters by 10%.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a pair of ferrets that increase the gold each monster drops.

runes.name: Wolf Companion
runes.description: Summon a powerful but temporary wolf ally rather than a long-term raven companion. The wolf will fight with you for 25 seconds and attacks enemies for 60% of your weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a wolf ally that fights along side you for a limited time.

skills.name: Companion
skills.description:
Cost: 10 Discipline

Summon a raven companion. Your raven companion will periodically peck at enemies for 30% of your weapon damage as Physical.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 10 Discipline

Summon a raven companion from the shadows.

runes.name: Dark Cloud
runes.description: Launch a massive volley of guided arrows that rain down on enemies for 42% weapon damage for the 12 seconds
runes.simpleDescription: Launch a massive volley of guided arrows that rain down on enemies.

runes.name: Beastly Bombs
runes.description: Summon 20 Shadow Beasts to drop bombs on enemies, dealing 150% weapon damage each.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon Shadow Beasts that fly overhead and drop bombs on enemies.

runes.name: Stampede
runes.description: Summon a wave of 10 Shadow Beasts to tear across the ground, knocking back enemies and dealing 100% weapon damage each.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon Shadow Beasts that swoop along the ground and damage enemies they hit.

runes.name: Anathema
runes.description: Summon a Shadow Beast that drops grenades from the sky for 10 seconds dealing 140% weapon damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a single Shadow Beast that hovers overhead and drops grenades.

runes.name: Flying Strike
runes.description: A group of 8 Shadow Beasts plummet from the sky at a targeted location dealing 75% weapon damage each and stunning enemies for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Call Shadow Beasts to plummet from the sky and bomb the target, stunning enemies in the area.

skills.name: Rain of Vengeance
skills.description:
Cost: 40 Hatred
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Fire a massive volley of arrows around you. Arrows fall from the sky dealing 91% weapon damage for 5 seconds to all enemies in the area.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 40 Hatred
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Unleash a torrent of arrows from the sky.

runes.name: Dazzling Arrow
runes.description: Enemies hit by grenades have a 65% chance to be stunned for 2.0 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: The grenades have a chance to Stun enemies.

runes.name: Shooting Stars
runes.description: Instead of releasing grenades, shoots up to 3 rockets at nearby enemies dealing 175% weapon damage as Physical each.
runes.simpleDescription: Release homing rockets instead of cluster grenades.

runes.name: Maelstrom
runes.description: Instead of releasing grenades, the cluster releases shadow energy that deals 145% weapon damage as Physical to nearby enemies. You will gain 4% of the damage done as Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Release tendrils of shadow energy on impact that replenish your Life.

runes.name: Cluster Bombs
runes.description: Launch the cluster through the air, dropping a series of bombs in a straight line that explode for 230% weapon damage as Fire each.
runes.simpleDescription: Arc the arrow and drop multiple bombs along its path.

runes.name: Loaded for Bear
runes.description: Increases the damage of the explosion at the impact location to 290% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the damage at the impact point.

skills.name: Cluster Arrow
skills.description:
Cost: 50 Hatred

Fire a cluster arrow that explodes for 200% weapon damage as Fire into a series of additional miniature bombs that explode for 100% weapon damage as Fire each.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Hatred

Fire a cluster arrow that fragments into multiple explosions on impact.

runes.name: Night Bane
runes.description: Gain an additional 15 Hatred per second while Shadow Power is active.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain additional Hatred while Shadow Power is active.

runes.name: Blood Moon
runes.description: Increases the amount of Life gained to 30% of all damage dealt.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the amount of Life gained.

runes.name: Well of Darkness
runes.description: Reduces Discipline cost to 16.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduces the Discipline cost of Shadow Power.

runes.name: Gloom
runes.description: While active, all incoming damage is reduced by 65%.
runes.simpleDescription: Shadow Power reduces incoming damage.

runes.name: Shadow Glide
runes.description: While active, gain 40% movement speed.
runes.simpleDescription: Shadow Power grants a movement bonus.

skills.name: Shadow Power
skills.description:
Cost: 20 Discipline

Draw in the power of the shadows, gaining 20% of all damage done as Life for 3 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Discipline

Gain Life for dealing damage for 3 seconds.
